ISSUE.TITLE: Apk delete after user disconnect?
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: STF has been run. Operating: 1.choose one of the device. 2.upload the apk and install it. 3.to disconnect device. 4.to choose the same device again. Result: Already installed app is deleted when the second use. Question: Whether has a feature that to del the last user's record?

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #344 from mitchtech/patch-1 Add sample Slack notifier unit to deployment doc

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Allow the cleanup plugin to be disabled. Resolves #346 and others. May need a more generic method to disable individual plugins later.
